headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From ServiceNow’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: ServiceNow’s third quarter results were well received by the market, with management attributing the positive outcome to accelerating adoption of its AI-powered workflow solutions and broad-based demand across key verticals. CEO William McDermott emphasized the company’s platform strength in integrating AI for business transformation, noting that the Now Assist suite and AI Control Tower both exceeded internal plans.
